name: Soon, You Will Fly
description:
A game by TCHOW for the Leap Motion Controller all about crawling your way back to virtue.

At the moment, it's in beta shape. Crawling control is reasonable, and some challenges are in place.

Version 4 adds:

  • Ability to respawn if flipped over (press backspace)
  • An ending screen

Version 3 adds:

  • A fourth objective; the central ring can be completed.
  • Escape quits.
  • Nicer looking tentacles.
